Droppables.DropExplanation: How would you like to arrange the actors in the folder on the canvas?
Droppables.DropJournalFolderExplanation: Drop all journal entries in {folderName} as pins?
Droppables.ActorUploadExplanation: Select the actor type for each file.
Droppables.SettingDropStyleHint: This is how the items in the folder will be dropped onto the canvas. Choosing "Dialog" will prompt you each time for one of the options.
Droppables.SettingEnableCanvasDragUploadHint: If enabled, you can drag and upload tokens, tiles, audio, and journal entries onto the canvas based on the selected layer.
